VIII.i.1.A.5.a
.
Presumptive Herbicide Exposure on Johnston Atoll
The PACT Act added a presumption of herbicide exposure for Veterans who served on Johnston Atoll or on a ship that called at Johnston Atoll during the period beginning on January 1, 1972, and ending on September 30, 1977.  Centralized processing teams are responsible for establishing qualifying Johnston Atoll nautical service.
Reference
:  For more information on when referral to the centralized processing team is appropriate, see the
PACT Act Implementation SOP
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) Based on Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
